thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn San Francisco Airport North - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (South San Francisco, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Friendly, comfortable stay
thread.title_full: Friendly, comfortable stay - Review of Hilton Garden Inn San Francisco Airport North, South San Francisco, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Roboduckie
title: Friendly, comfortable stay
text:
Nice location (Oyster Point) in a business area banked by nice rolling hills to one side. Easy, quick ride from SFO - $20 cab ride only 5-10 minutes (no traffic).
Property is clean, parking is free and is close in proximity to Grand ave - plenty of dining and shopping. Frt desk folks were friendly and helpful as were the breakfast staff. Spacious lobby for impromptu meetings was great and bar has decent beer/wine selections but limited tap. 1-king room was spacious and comfortable. High-floor room was quiet. All room amenities worked great.
Typical breakfast options at Hilton properties, but cooked-to-order stuff is great. Nice option of taking hotel shuttle back to SFO at crack of dawn. Would stay here again.
